00046 #ifndef H_TimeUtils
00047 # define H_TimeUtils
00048 
00049 # include <sys/time.h>
00050 
00051 # include <cmath>
00052 
00053 # include <iostream>
00054 # include <iomanip>
00055 
00059 # define TV_USEC_F 1000000l
00060 
00061 namespace TREX {
00062   namespace utils {
00063   
00073     inline bool operator< (timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00074       return t1.tv_sec < t2.tv_sec ||
00075        (t1.tv_sec == t2.tv_sec && t1.tv_usec < t2.tv_usec);
00076     }
00077 
00087     inline bool operator==(timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00088       return (t1.tv_sec == t2.tv_sec && t1.tv_usec == t2.tv_usec);
00089     }
00090     
00100     inline bool operator!=(timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00101       return !operator==(t1, t2);
00102     }
00103 
00113     inline bool operator> (timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00114       return t2<t1;
00115     }
00116     
00126     inline bool operator<=(timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00127       return !operator> (t1, t2);
00128     }
00129 
00139     inline bool operator>=(timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00140       return !operator< (t1, t2);
00141     }
00142     
00151     inline timeval operator+ (timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00152       timeval result;
00153       
00154       result.tv_sec = t1.tv_sec + t2.tv_sec;
00155       if ( (result.tv_usec = t1.tv_usec + t2.tv_usec)>=TV_USEC_F ) {
00156        ++result.tv_sec;
00157        result.tv_usec -= TV_USEC_F;
00158       }
00159       return result;
00160     }
00161 
00173     inline double to_double(timeval const &t) {
00174       double result = t.tv_usec;
00175       
00176       result /= TV_USEC_F;
00177       result += t.tv_sec;
00178       return result;
00179     }
00180 
00187     inline timeval to_timeval(double v) {
00188       timeval res;
00189       res.tv_sec = static_cast<long>(std::floor(v));
00190       res.tv_usec = static_cast<long>(std::floor((v-res.tv_sec)*1e6));
00191       return res;
00192     }
00193     
00204     inline timeval &operator+=(timeval &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00205       t1.tv_sec += t2.tv_sec;
00206       if ( (t1.tv_usec += t2.tv_usec) >= TV_USEC_F ) {
00207        ++t1.tv_sec;
00208        t1.tv_usec -= TV_USEC_F;
00209       }
00210       return t1;
00211     }
00212 
00221     inline timeval operator- (timeval const &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00222       timeval result;
00223       result.tv_sec = t1.tv_sec - t2.tv_sec;
00224       if ( (result.tv_usec = t1.tv_usec - t2.tv_usec) < 0 ) {
00225        --result.tv_sec;
00226        result.tv_usec += TV_USEC_F;
00227       }
00228       return result;
00229     }
00230 
00239     inline timeval operator/ (timeval const &t, long n) {
00240       timeval result;
00241       
00242       result.tv_sec = t.tv_sec / n;
00243       result.tv_usec = ((t.tv_sec % n) * TV_USEC_F + t.tv_usec) / n;
00244       
00245       return result;
00246     }
00247 
00256     inline timeval operator* (timeval const &t, long n) {
00257       timeval result;
00258       
00259       result.tv_usec = t.tv_usec * n;
00260       result.tv_sec = t.tv_sec * n + (result.tv_usec) / TV_USEC_F;
00261       result.tv_usec = result.tv_usec % TV_USEC_F;
00262       
00263       return result;    
00264     }
00265     
00276     inline timeval &operator-=(timeval &t1, timeval const &t2) {
00277       t1.tv_sec -= t2.tv_sec;
00278       if ( (t1.tv_usec -= t2.tv_usec) < 0 ) {
00279        --t1.tv_sec;
00280        t1.tv_usec += TV_USEC_F;
00281       }
00282       return t1;
00283     }
00284 
00296     inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, timeval const& t) {
00297       if( t.tv_sec>=0 ) 
00298        return os<<t.tv_sec<<'.'<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<t.tv_usec;
00299       else {
00300        if( -1==t.tv_sec )
00301          os<<'-';
00302        return os<<(t.tv_sec+1)<<'.'<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')
00303                <<(TV_USEC_F-t.tv_usec);
00304       }       
00305     }
00306     
00307   } // utils 
00308 } // TREX

00310 #endif // H_TimeUtils
